headline.main: Poll Shows 71 Percent of French Want Fillon to Quit Presidency Race
headline.print_headline: Poll Shows 71 Percent of French Want Fillon to Quit Presidency Race

lead_paragraph: More than two-thirds of French voters want conservative candidate Francois Fillon to withdraw his presidential bid following an alleged fake job's scandal, according to an Ifop poll for the weekly Journal du Dimanche newspaper.
snippet: More than two-thirds of French voters want conservative candidate Francois Fillon to withdraw his presidential bid following an alleged fake job's scandal, according to an Ifop poll for the weekly Journal du Dimanche newspaper....
